mapper.insert: insert into drink(drinkId, dName, typeId, details, price, img, brix, temp, extra, size, evStar) value (#{drinkId}, #{dName}, #{typeId}, #{details}, #{price}, #{img}, #{brix}, #{temp}, #{extra}, #{size}, #{evStar})
mapper.select: select * from drink where dName like concat('%', #{str}, '%')
select * from drink where price between #{low} and #{high}
mapper.update: update drink set evStar = #{evStar} where drinkId = #{drinkId}
